title: SET_PED_SHOOTS_AT_COORD
content:
0x96A05E4FB321B1BA0xFD64EAE5// SetPedShootsAtCoord
void SET_PED_SHOOTS_AT_COORD(Ped ped, float x, float y, float z, BOOL toggle);Parameters:ped: Ped index.x: y: z: toggle: Fires a weapon at a coordinate using a ped.
codeBlocks:
// SetPedShootsAtCoord
void SET_PED_SHOOTS_AT_COORD(Ped ped, float x, float y, float z, BOOL toggle);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_PED_SHOOTS_AT_COORD
SetPedShootsAtCoord(ped, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, false)
